messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] messages
messages.msgSnippet: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] messagesOh I thought something was wrong, being new to the list. The  number of posts dropped dramaticly over night, literally.
messages.messageBody:
Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] messages
Oh I thought something was wrong, being new to the list. The  number of posts dropped dramaticly over night, literally.  Thanx. :- )  Corallyn
----- Original Message -----
From: Bill Ellis
 
Summer is here. Everyone is on vacation.

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] messages
messages.msgSnippet: Summer is here. Everyone is on vacation. ... From: Corallyn  I was just wondering if there have almost no posts today or am I not
messages.messageBody:
Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] messages Summer is here. Everyone is on vacation.

----------
From: "Corallyn" <hape2day@...>

I was just wondering if there have almost no posts today or am I not receiving the emails. Usually I get about 30 from this list a day. Today I have gotten maybe 2 or 3.   Corallyn

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] messages
messages.msgSnippet: I have been on egroups for a few years now and I have never had problems before. This is so odd. I went to the egroups site to see the archives. There is
messages.messageBody:
I have been on egroups for a few years now and I have never had problems before. This is so odd. I went to the egroups site to see the archives. There is nothing in there that I haven't received. Corallyn

From: Lynda

Me too, Corallyn.  But egroups has been acting weird lately and I'll get
nothing and then I'll get tons with many duplicates.

Lynda
